episodes.synopsis: Deep in the Belize jungle, Cory clears a cave of venomous snakes, while Jason helps a photographer get close-range photos of bison in South Dakota.
episodes.title: Buffalo Stampede

episodes.synopsis: Rob and Puma help the New Mexico Game and Fish Department track a mountain lion, while in Minnesota, Jason helps a client get a close look at wolves.
episodes.title: Wolf Watch

episodes.synopsis: Rob and Puma rush to North Carolina to help a business owner with a black bear problem, while Cory tracks a wild boar in the Bahamas.
episodes.title: Wild Boar Rampage

episodes.synopsis: Cory travels to a Costa Rican fish hatchery to protect workers from crocodiles, and Jason ventures to a South Dakota ranch plagued by a mountain lion.
episodes.title: Death Roll

episodes.synopsis: Fearing for the safety of their guests and employees, resort owners in Pennsylvania hire Rob and Puma to stop an infestation of black bears.
episodes.title: Bear Alert

episodes.synopsis: Cory travels to a logging camp in the Amazon where workers fear a jaguar, while Jason is in Alaska to protect a remote mining camp from bears.
episodes.title: Bear in Sight

video.title: The Savage Line
video.synopsis: Outdoorsmen Cory Valdes, Jason Lesmeister, Rob Hardy and Puma Ghostwalker cross the globe to protect and prevent conflict between people and wildlife.
